text: A.C. Waltman House, also known as Carl Adams House, is a historic home located at La Grange, Lewis County, Missouri. It was built about 1853, and is a 2 1/2-story, three bay, massed plan, brick dwelling with Greek Revival / Italianate style design elements. It has a one-story frame rear ell. It features a flattened gable roof and a full-width front porch supported by tapered, fluted Doric order columns. (includes 11 photographs from 1998-1999) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1999. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Greek Revival houses in Missouri Category:Italianate architecture in Missouri Category:Houses completed in 1853 Category:Buildings and structures in Lewis County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Lewis County, Missouri
title: A.C. Waltman House
